name: hydrographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the scientific study of the typical features of oceans, lakes, and rivers, and to making maps that represent them: Our surveyors perform hydrographic surveys of rivers and oceans. During their voyage, the officers kept hydrographic records, which were later published.
More examplesFewer examplesThe new hydrographic survey of the area confirms our earlier findings.He was already engaged in his great hydrographic study off the coast of Spain.We are carrying out a hydrographic charting exercise in these waters.He trained as a hydrographic surveyor and was commissioned to work in the waters around Sweden.
